premise_source_doc_sentence: Lead actor Jason Bateman has been nominated for ten individual awards for his role as Michael Bluth , the President of the Bluth Company , winning the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in a Comedy Series and two Satellite Awards for Best Actor in a Comedy Series .
